DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic in the Movement phase when a model from your kill team Advances. That model has a 3+ invulnerable save until the start of the next battle round.
DescriptionFr: Utilisez cette tactique à la phase de Mouvement quand une figurine de votre kill team avance. Cette figurine a une sauvegarde invulnérable de 3+ jusqu'au début du prochain round de bataille.
DescriptionDe: Setze diese Taktik in der Bewegungsphase ein, wenn ein Modell aus deinem Kill Team vorrückt. Dieses Modell hat bis zum Beginn der nächsten Schlachtrunde einen Rettungswurf von 3+.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic after an enemy model has Fallen Back from a model from your kill team. Provided no other enemy models are within 1" of your model, it can shoot at the model that Fell Back as if it were the Shooting phase.
DescriptionFr: Utilisez cette tactique après qu'une figurine ennemie a battu en retraite face à une figurine de votre kill team. SI aucune figurine ennemie n'est à 1" de votre figurine, elle peut tirer sur la figurine qui a battu en retraite comme si c'était la phase de tir.
DescriptionDe: Setze diese Taktik ein, nachdem sich ein feindliches Modell von einem Modell deines Kill Teams zurückgezogen hat. Sind keine anderen feindlichen Modelle innerhalb von 1" um dein Modell, kann dieses wie in der Fernkampfphase auf das Modell schießen, das sich zurückgezogen hat.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic in the Movement phase when a model from your kill team Advances. Add 6" to the model's Move characteristic for that Movement phase instead of rolling a dice.
DescriptionFr: Utilisez cette tactique à la phase de Mouvement quand une figurine de votre kill team avance. Ajoutez 6" à la caractéristique de Mouvement de la figurine pour cette phase de mouvement au lieu de jeter le dé.
DescriptionDe: Setze diese Taktik in deiner Bewegungsphase ein, wenn ein Modell aus deinem Kill Team vorrückt. Addiere in dieser Phase 6‘‘ auf den Bewegungswert, anstatt einen Würfel zu werfen.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic at the end of the Fight phase. Pick a model from your kill team that has already fought this phase. That model can immediately fight an additional time.
DescriptionFr: Utilisez cette tactique à la fin de la phase de combat. Désignez une figurine de votre kill team qui a déjà combattu à cette phase. La figurine peut immédiatement combattre à nouveau.
DescriptionDe: Setze diese Taktik am Ende der Nahkampfphase ein. Wähle ein Modell aus deinem Kill Team, das in dieser Phase bereits gekämpft hat. Dieses Modell darf sofort ein weiteres Mal kämpfen.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic after a model from your kill team shoots in the Shooting phase. The model can immediately make a normal move of up to 7" as if it were the Movement phase.
DescriptionFr: Utilisez cette tactique après qu'une figurine a tiré à la phase de tir. La figurine peut immédiatement effectuer un mouvement normal jusqu'à 7" comme si c'était sa phase de mouvement.
DescriptionDe: Setze diese Taktik ein, nachdem ein Modell aus deinem Kill Team in der Fernkampfphase geschossen hat. Das Modell darf sofort wie in der Bewegungsphase eine normale Bewegung von bis zu 7" durchführen.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic when a model from your kill team is chosen to fight. Re-roll failed hit rolls and failed wound rolls for this model's attacks that target SLAANESH models until the end of the phase.
DescriptionFr: Utilisez cette tactique quand une figurine de votre kill team est choisie pour combattre. Relancez les jets de touche et de blessure ratés pour les attaques de cette figurine qui ciblent des figurines des Slaanesh jusqu'à la fin de la phase.
DescriptionDe: Setze diese Taktik ein, wenn ein Modell aus deinem Kill Team gewählt wird, um zu kämpfen. Wiederhole bis zum Ende der Phase misslungene Treffer- und Verwundungswürfe für Attacken dieses Modells, die SLAANESH-Modelle zum Ziel haben.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic at the start of the Shooting phase if your kill team includes a DEATH JESTER. That model gains the following aura ability until the end of the phase: As long as this model is not shaken, you can add 1 to wound rolls for friendly models that are within 6" of this model.
DescriptionFr: Utilisez cette tactique au début de la phase de Tir si votre kill team inclut un Death Jester. Cette figurine gagne l'aptitude d'aura suivante jusqu'à la fin du round: Tant que cette figurine n'est pas secouée, vous pouvez ajouter 1 aux jets de blessure des figurines amies à 6" de cette figurine.
DescriptionDe: Setze diese Taktik zu Beginn der Fernphase ein, wenn dein Kill Team einen DEATH JESTER enthält. Bis zum Ende der Schlachtrunde erhält dieses Modell die folgende Aurafähigkeit: Solange dieses Modell nicht erschüttert ist, darfst du auf die Verwundungswürfe befreundeter Modelle innerhalb von 6'' um dieses Modell 1 addieren.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic at the start of the Fight phase if your kill team includes a TROUPE MASTER. That model gains the following aura ability until the end of the battle round: As long as this model is not shaken, you can re-roll failed wound rolls for friendly models that are within 6" of this model.
DescriptionFr: Utilisez cette tactique au début de la phase de Combat si votre kill team inclut un Troupe Master. Cette figurine gagne l'aptitude d'aura suivante jusqu'à la fin du round: Tant que cette figurine n'est pas secouée, vous pouvez relancer les jets de blessure ratés des figurines amies qui sont à 6" de cette figurine.
DescriptionDe: Setze diese Taktik zu Beginn der Schlachtrunde ein, wenn dein Kill Team einen TROUPE MASTER enthält. Bis zum Ende der Schlachtrunde erhält dieses Modell die folgende Aurafähigkeit: Solange dieses Modell nicht erschüttert ist, darst du für befreundete Modelle innerhalb von 6'' um dieses Modell misslungene Verwundungswürfe wiederholen.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic in the Movement phase, immediately after making a charge roll of 10+ for a model from your kill team.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic in the Movement phase, immediately after making a charge roll of 10+ for a model from your kill team.
DescriptionDe: Use this Tactic in the Movement phase, immediately after making a charge roll of 10+ for a model from your kill team.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic in the Morale phase when an enemy model fails a Nerve test. Until the end of the phase, models from your kill team do not need to take Nerve tests whilst they are within 6" of that model.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic in the Morale phase when an enemy model fails a Nerve test. Until the end of the phase, models from your kill team do not need to take Nerve tests whilst they are within 6" of that model.
DescriptionDe: Use this Tactic in the Morale phase when an enemy model fails a Nerve test. Until the end of the phase, models from your kill team do not need to take Nerve tests whilst they are within 6" of that model.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic when a COMMANDER from your kill team is reduced to 0 wounds by an attack. Only one dice is rolled for the subsequent Injury roll, regardless of the Damage characteristic of the weapon that made the attack.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic when a COMMANDER from your kill team is reduced to 0 wounds by an attack. Only one dice is rolled for the subsequent Injury roll, regardless of the Damage characteristic of the weapon that made the attack.
DescriptionDe: Use this Tactic when a COMMANDER from your kill team is reduced to 0 wounds by an attack. Only one dice is rolled for the subsequent Injury roll, regardless of the Damage characteristic of the weapon that made the attack.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic in the Movement phase. Pick a model (other than a shaken model) from your kill team that has not moved this phase, and is within 1" of an enemy model. Move that model up to 2" so that is more than 1" from any enemy models. You can then declare a charge with that model, as if it was not within 1" of an enemy model at the start of the phase. Subtract 2 from the charge roll.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic in the Movement phase. Pick a model (other than a shaken model) from your kill team that has not moved this phase, and is within 1" of an enemy model. Move that model up to 2" so that is more than 1" from any enemy models. You can then declare a charge with that model, as if it was not within 1" of an enemy model at the start of the phase. Subtract 2 from the charge roll.
DescriptionDe: Use this Tactic in the Movement phase. Pick a model (other than a shaken model) from your kill team that has not moved this phase, and is within 1" of an enemy model. Move that model up to 2" so that is more than 1" from any enemy models. You can then declare a charge with that model, as if it was not within 1" of an enemy model at the start of the phase. Subtract 2 from the charge roll.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic at the end of the Movement phase. Choose up to three models from your kill team that were set up in Reserve. Set one of those models up anywhere on the battlefield that is more that 5" away from any enemy models, then set up any remaining models within 2" of that model, and more than 5" away from any enemy models.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic at the end of the Movement phase. Choose up to three models from your kill team that were set up in Reserve. Set one of those models up anywhere on the battlefield that is more that 5" away from any enemy models, then set up any remaining models within 2" of that model, and more than 5" away from any enemy models.
DescriptionDe: Use this Tactic at the end of the Movement phase. Choose up to three models from your kill team that were set up in Reserve. Set one of those models up anywhere on the battlefield that is more that 5" away from any enemy models, then set up any remaining models within 2" of that model, and more than 5" away from any enemy models.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic in the Fire at Will section of the Shooting phase, when it is your turn to choose a model to shoot. Pick a model from your kill team that made a charge model this battle round. That model can shoot with a Pistol.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic in the Fire at Will section of the Shooting phase, when it is your turn to choose a model to shoot. Pick a model from your kill team that made a charge model this battle round. That model can shoot with a Pistol.
DescriptionDe: Use this Tactic in the Fire at Will section of the Shooting phase, when it is your turn to choose a model to shoot. Pick a model from your kill team that made a charge model this battle round. That model can shoot with a Pistol.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic in the Psychic phase when you choose a SHADOWSEER from your kill team to manifest psychic powers. Instead of attempting to manifest psychic powers, remove that model from the battlefield and palce it in Reserve.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic in the Psychic phase when you choose a SHADOWSEER from your kill team to manifest psychic powers. Instead of attempting to manifest psychic powers, remove that model from the battlefield and palce it in Reserve.
DescriptionDe: Use this Tactic in the Psychic phase when you choose a SHADOWSEER from your kill team to manifest psychic powers. Instead of attempting to manifest psychic powers, remove that model from the battlefield and palce it in Reserve.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic at the end of the Movement phase. Choose two models from your kill team (other than shaken models) that are within 8" of each other. Mark each model's position with a counter, then remove each model from the battlefield and place each model in the exact position the other previously occupied. If either of those models are no longer within 1" of any enemy models, they are considered to have Fallen Back (even if they did not start the phase within 1" of an enemy model). If either of those models are within 1" of any enemy models, they are considered to have charged all enemy models within 1".
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic at the end of the Movement phase. Choose two models from your kill team (other than shaken models) that are within 8" of each other. Mark each model's position with a counter, then remove each model from the battlefield and place each model in the exact position the other previously occupied. If either of those models are no longer within 1" of any enemy models, they are considered to have Fallen Back (even if they did not start the phase within 1" of an enemy model). If either of those models are within 1" of any enemy models, they are considered to have charged all enemy models within 1".
DescriptionDe: Use this Tactic at the end of the Movement phase. Choose two models from your kill team (other than shaken models) that are within 8" of each other. Mark each model's position with a counter, then remove each model from the battlefield and place each model in the exact position the other previously occupied. If either of those models are no longer within 1" of any enemy models, they are considered to have Fallen Back (even if they did not start the phase within 1" of an enemy model). If either of those models are within 1" of any enemy models, they are considered to have charged all enemy models within 1".
